name: Skateboard Customization - 2018
description:
A skateboard customization system created for a commissioned project. The system's functionality is for letting the customer pick whatever design of their skateboard would they want to be, part-by-part. The system has five main skateboard parts to choose from. The price of each part and the skateboard as a whole will be shown when the customer finalizes his choice and click the checkout. 

Disclaimer: This is offline for demo purpose only.
